subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Nadal kept rolling in his first clay-court tournament of the season with a 7-5, 6-3 quarterfinals victory over Pablo Carreño Busta at the Rio Open.
snippet: Nadal kept rolling in his first clay-court tournament of the season with a 7-5, 6-3 quarterfinals victory over Pablo Carreño Busta at the Rio Open.
